Questioner_MultipleSubQ.init_prompt: Generate 1 sub-question about image that will help answer the main question, when main-question is '{}'.
Questioner_MultipleSubQ.after_prompt: Create a question that asks about different information than the following questions.

Reasoner.init_prompt: You have to answer the Q: '{}'. You can use the following Q&A results to help you answer:
Reasoner.final_prompt: Based on the previously mentioned Q&A content and the image, answer the following question briefly. {}
